casebody.data:
No. 10-8896. Louis Douglas Halley, IV, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 563 U.S. 941, 131 S. Ct. 2102,

179 L. Ed. 2d 900,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3145. April 18, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
